Who was found guilty of murdering his wife and son?
Alex Murdaugh
Where did the trial take place?
Colleton County Courthouse in Walterboro, South Carolina
When were Maggie and Paul Murdaugh found dead?
June 7, 2021
How long did the jury deliberate before reaching a verdict?
Three hours
What is the possible sentence for Alex Murdaugh?
Life in prison
Who is the state Attorney General that spoke outside the courthouse?
Alan Wilson
What was the motive prosecutors argued for Alex Murdaugh to commit the murders?
To divert attention away from himself amid a gathering storm of events that threatened to expose his alleged financial deeds
What was the key piece of evidence that contradicted Alex's version of events?
A video from Paul's phone showing Alex with Maggie and Paul just minutes before their phones were locked for the last time
What were some of the mistakes made by law enforcement during the investigation?
Lack of controlled access to the crime scene, potential destruction of evidence, and delayed searches
What was the alleged scheme involving Alex on Labor Day weekend in 2021?
A suicide-for-hire scheme to have his drug dealer kill him so his son Buster would receive a $10 million life insurance payout
